reformulated1: What are the latest advances in cleavable linker technologies for antibody-drug conjugates, including stimuli-responsive and traceless linker designs?
reformulated2: How do site-specific conjugation strategies, such as engineered cysteines and enzymatic methods, improve the homogeneity and stability of ADC linker attachment?
reformulated3: What polymer-modified and multiloading linker approaches have been developed to enhance the pharmacokinetic properties and drug-to-antibody ratios in modern ADCs?
